product_name: Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The rimless Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses give you unobstructed views of the surf, sand and sea. Advanced lenses offer clarity, contrast and a vivid color experience. ChromaPop lenses use a proprietary technology to optimize color and increase clarity and definition, enabling you to see the outside world with exceptional vibrance. Polarized glass lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black and Midnight Blue frame colors feature gray-green tinted lenses, ideal for medium-to-bright light. Dark Brown frame color features brown tinted lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. The Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses feature a hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends that get tacky when wet for grip during exercise and hot weather. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants.
